Description: At the request of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, a federal district court entered a final judgment against debt relief company Morgan Drexen, Inc., resolving a lawsuit filed by the CFPB in August 2013. The Bureau's lawsuit against Morgan Drexen alleged that the company charged illegal upfront fees and deceived consumers.
Morgan Drexen was ordered to pay $1,890,000 IN forfeiture and $4,253,081 IN restitution in an Order finding it had unlawfully done business as an adjustment services company.
